Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Relates to prohibited combative sports that result in the injury of an individual
Summary: Relates to criminal penalties for persons who knowingly advance or profit from prohibited combative sports that result in the injury of any individual.
LawCode: Amd ยง1019, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibited combative sports that result in the injury of an individual
